text:
xmap <expr> <C-Left> DVB_Drag('left')
xmap <expr> <C-Right> DVB_Drag('right')
xmap <expr> <C-Down> DVB_Drag('down')
xmap <expr> <C-Up> DVB_Drag('up')
	
xmap <expr> D DVB_Duplicate()
	
xnoremap > >gv
xnoremap < <gv
	
vnoremap <down> dpV`]
vnoremap <up> dkPV`]
	
nnoremap <down> :m .+1<CR>==
nnoremap <up> :m .-2<CR>==
vnoremap <down> :m '>+1<CR>gv=gv
vnoremap <up> :m '<-2<CR>gv=gv
	
vnoremap J :m '>+1<CR>gv=gv
vnoremap K :m '<-2<CR>gv=gv
	
:h p
:h P
:h ]p
:h o
:h O
:h .
:h u
:h >
:h ']
:h gv
	
1 aaa
2 bbb
3 ccc
4 ddd
	
:$put _ ..................... add a new line at the end
4k .........................  move to the begining of {example 4}
5:m-0 ......................  move next 5 lines to line zero
}}j ........................  move to {example 3}
5:m-11 .....................  move block to 11 lines before
}j .........................  move to the {example 2}
5:m-6 ......................  finishes the magic
